title: DHL
description: DHL is a global logistics company recognizable by its vibrant brand colors: yellow (#FFCC00) and red (#D40511), often contrasted with white (#FFFFFF) and black (#000000). Known for its bold and eye-catching color scheme, these colors are prominently featured in logos and marketing materials. This color palette reflects the brand's dynamic and energetic persona, as detailed in their official branding guide sourced from the DHL brand portal.
